## Purchases.changeUser() method

Change the current app user id. Returns the customer info for the new user id.

**Signature:**

```typescript
changeUser(newAppUserId: string): Promise<CustomerInfo>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  newAppUserId | string | The user id to change to. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[CustomerInfo](./purchases-js.customerinfo.md)<!-- -->&gt;
